div.head: Boundary Dispute between Delphi and Ambryssos
div.p: Date(s): uncertain date prior to early 2d century

p.seg:
This boundary dispute, judged by an individual named Cassius Longinus, His identity is debated. See the Prosopographic Index. is known only through a brief reference in a decision rendered in a later case (Text
39.1 (Elliott 2004) and Text
39.2 (Elliott 2004) ). See Instance
39 (Elliott 2004) for a complete discussion and references. This dispute may be classified as boundary-related on the grounds that a surveyor was required to create a determinatio in order to implement Longinus’ verdict ([ --- decr]etum).
